sn17.9:1.3: Upari, bhikkhave, akase verambha nama vata vayanti.
sn17.9:1.4: Tattha yo pakkhi gacchati tamenam verambha vata khipanti.
sn17.9:1.5: Tassa verambhavatakkhittassa anneneva pada gacchanti, annena pakkha gacchanti, annena sisam gacchati, annena kayo gacchati.
sn17.9:1.6: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhikkhu labhasakkarasilokena abhibhuto pariyadinnacitto pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya gamam va nigamam va pindaya pavisati arakkhiteneva kayena arakkhitaya vacaya arakkhitena cittena, anupatthitaya satiya, asamvutehi indriyehi.
sn17.9:1.7: So tattha passati matugamam dunnivattham va dupparutam va.
sn17.9:1.8: Tassa matugamam disva dunnivattham va dupparutam va rago cittam anuddhamseti.
sn17.9:1.9: So raganuddhamsitena cittena sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavattati.
sn17.9:1.10: Tassa anne civaram haranti, anne pattam haranti, anne nisidanam haranti, anne sucigharam haranti, verambhavatakkhittasseva sakunassa.
